TopicTitle: Saturn V and Mercury(Atlas and Redstone) Replicas(sort of)

Articles.Content:
Just made some rocket replicas, without using too much parts and making them easy to fly.

Pics: http://imgur.com/a/zlrqP

Crafts don't have mechjeb cases, so you don't need it installed.

Redstone: http://www./view/vtm6n5cnz3cu2ao/Mercury-Redstone.craft

Atlas: http://www./view/b9tnyb7f1ce95hp/Mercury-Atlas.craft

Gemini: http://www./view/sarcevrkls4lssh/Gemini.craft

SaturnI: http://www./view/xmwzixm5guz33vk/Saturn_1.craft

SaturnIB: http://www./view/rxrdrw4f679khha/Saturn_1B.craft

SaturnV: http://www./view/hausi819leiut4h/Saturn_V.craft

Shuttle:http://www./view/386zq21ff9ocfcf/Cargo_Shuttle.craft

Soyuz: http://www./view/xywfbntr5q16va6/Soyuz.craft

Not perfect replicas in aesthetics, but they are fail-friendly(especially the SaturnV). Feel free to sugest anything

Current Progress: Taking sugestions

Firstly, welcome to the forum!

Are these the first replicas you have made?

If you want embed an Imgur album post a message quoting my message here and copy and paste the link.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited October 29, 2014 by Majorjim

Well, i made a shuttle replica, but wasn't happy with it since it would flip out when reentrying without winglets next to the tail, which made it not a replica.
